column5: Past 2 days have been wet and miserable. Time to catch up on the seasonal kitchen chores. After 48 hrs, one freezer is chock full of veggies, and the table....  .... is covered in salsa and pickles.  Would be real nice to have some outdoor kinda weather.
Bruce,I would love a spread of mustard pickles over my potted meat.  Im drooling.   Speaking of,I got a hunger on.
Almost time for some of your salsa
